title: Global Sustainable Stories/Usecases
description: There should be more of a spotlight on Cardano projects implemented in Africa, their stories, challenges & solutions across the continent.
solution: Share stories from change agents in Africa and diaspora, engaging with Cardano in cascading disruption, creating a better tomorrow, today.
experience: Economics, Sustainability, Humanities, Social Sciences, NGO's, Social Entrepreneurs, Writers, Blogging, Video Editing, Figma, Canva
